title: How to Install Moodle on Debian 12
description:
In this tutorial, we will show you how to install Moodle on Debian 12. Moodle stands out as a beacon of open-source learning management systems (LMS). Renowned for its flexibility and robustness, Moodle caters to educators’ and learners‘ diverse needs, offering a platform for creating personalized learning environments.

The post How to Install Moodle on Debian 12 appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Happy Third Birthday to the AlmaLinux OS Foundation!
description:
Time to put on your birthday hat and sing Happy Birthday. Today the AlmaLinux OS Foundation turns three!

The post Happy Third Birthday to the AlmaLinux OS Foundation! appeared first on Linux Today.
